evidence.text: This Court reiterates it is not deciding whether Virginia’s license suspension scheme is unconstitutional. All this Court is deciding (indeed, all it has the legal authority to decide) is that it lacks the lawful ability to rule on the merits of Plaintiffs’ challenge, at least as this lawsuit is currently constituted. Thus, the Commissioner’s motion to dismiss will be granted.

No further extraction is possible or required.
